items.title: The share of female CEOs running Global 500 companies hits a record high of 6.6%
items.description: Thirty-three Global 500 companies have female CEOs.

items.title: Shockingly bad jobs report reveals a months-long stall and may trigger Fed rate cuts soon. ‘Powell is going to regret holding rates steady’
items.description: "September is a lock for a rate cut and it might even be a 50-basis point move to make up the lost time."

items.title: Stocks dive as job numbers disappoint and tariff ‘panic’ sets in
items.description: Trump, meanwhile, continues to beat the drum against Fed chair Jerome Powell.

items.title: Trump rips into ‘stubborn’ Jerome Powell, calls for Fed’s board to launch a coup and seize power
items.description: If Powell doesn't “substantially” lower rates, Trump said, “THE BOARD SHOULD ASSUME CONTROL, AND DO WHAT EVERYONE KNOWS HAS TO BE DONE!”

items.title: China’s plan to stop Elon Musk’s Starlink includes submarines that can shoot lasers into space
items.description: Supply-chain sabotage and custom-built attack satellites armed with ion thrusters are others strategies Chinese scientists have been developing, an AP...
